    interfacer

    interfacer.Rmd
    devtools::load_all()
#> ℹ Loading interfacer
library(interfacer)
    .iface = iface(
  id = integer ~ "an integer ID",
  test = logical ~ "the test result"
)
    .iface_missing = iface(
  .iface,
  missing = character ~ "a missing value"
)
    print(.iface)
#> A dataframe containing the following columns: 
#> * id (integer} - an integer ID
#> * test (logical} - the test result
    example_fn = function(
  parm,
  mydata = .iface,
  another = "value",
  ...
) {
  mydata = ivalidate(mydata, ...)
  return(mydata)
}
    example_fn(
  "a",
  tibble::tibble(
    id=c(1,2,3),
    test_rename = c(TRUE,FALSE,TRUE)
  ), .imap = imap(test=test_rename) )
#> # A tibble: 3 × 3
#>      id test_rename test 
#>   <int> <lgl>       <lgl>
#> 1     1 TRUE        TRUE 
#> 2     2 FALSE       FALSE
#> 3     3 TRUE        TRUE
    example_fn2 = function(
    parm,
    mydata = .iface_missing,
    another = "value",
    ...
) {
  mydata = ivalidate(mydata, ..., prune = TRUE)
  return(mydata)
}
    cat(idocument(example_fn2, mydata))
#> A dataframe containing the following columns: 
#> * id (integer} - an integer ID
#> * missing (character} - a missing value
#> * test (logical} - the test result
    example_fn2(
  "a",
  tibble::tibble(
    id=c(1,2,3),
    test_rename = c(TRUE,FALSE,TRUE)
  ), .imap = imap(test=test_rename,missing="fixed") )
#> # A tibble: 3 × 3
#>      id missing test 
#>   <int> <chr>   <lgl>
#> 1     1 fixed   TRUE 
#> 2     2 fixed   FALSE
#> 3     3 fixed   TRUE
    try(
  example_fn2(
  "a",
  tibble::tibble(
    id=c(1,2,3),
    test_rename = c(TRUE,FALSE,TRUE)
  ), .imap = imap(test=test_rename) )
)
#> Error in ivalidate(mydata, ..., prune = TRUE) : 
#>   1 missing columns in parameter `mydata` in call to example_fn2(...)
#> consider renaming to create `missing` columns
#> or by adding `.imap = interfacer::imap(`missing` = ???)` to your function call.
